options.name: host
options.description: Host address to bind to. By default it supports "any address"

options.name: port
options.description: Port to listen on

options.name: root
options.description: The root directory

options.name: cache
options.description: Time in milliseconds for caching files in the browser

options.name: log-level
options.description: Display logs in the console. The possible values are `silent`, `error`, `warn`, `info`, `debug`. Any logs of a higher level than the setting are shown. If you define it as `info`, it will show `warn` and `error` outputs also

options.name: silent
options.description: Set `log-level` to `silent` mode

options.name: verbose
options.description: Set `log-level` to `debug` mode

options.name: localhost
options.description: Only works locally. Block external connections

options.name: no-cache
options.description: Disabled the caching files in the browser

options.name: no-port-scan
options.description: Disabled the port scanning when the selected port is already in use

options.name: cors
options.description: Setup CORS headers to allow requests from any origin

options.name: directory-index
options.description: The index file of a directory. Set to false to always show the directory listing

options.name: open
options.description: Open browser window after starting the server

options.name: no-listing
options.description: Turn off the directory listings

options.name: notifications
options.description: Activate automatic notifications launching

options.name: browser
options.description: Specify browser to use instead of system default

options.name: layout
options.description: Specify the page layout. Available options `grid` or `list`

options.name: auth
options.description: Enables http-auth using the `PAGES_USER` and `PAGES_PASSWORD` environment variables

options.name: unzipped
options.description: Disable GZIP compression

options.name: no-clipboard
options.description: Don't copy address to clipboard

options.name: ignore
options.description: Files and directories to ignore. Use a string (comma-separated string for paths to ignore) if your are using the command line and an array if you are calling it via API

options.name: help
options.description: Output usage information

options.name: version
options.description: Output the version number
